results.overview: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters.
results.title: The Addams Family 2

results.overview: The assassin Deathstroke tries to save his family from the wrath of H.I.V.E. and the murderous Jackal.
results.title: Deathstroke: Knights & Dragons - The Movie

results.original_title: 劇場版 七つの大罪 光に呪われし者たち
results.overview: With the help of the "Dragon Sin of Wrath" Meliodas and the worst rebels in history, the Seven Deadly Sins, the "Holy War", in which four races, including Humans, Goddesses, Fairies and Giants fought against the Demons, is finally over. At the cost of the "Lion Sin of Pride" Escanor's life, the Demon King was defeated and the world regained peace. After that, each of the Sins take their own path.
results.title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Cursed by Light

results.original_title: 劇場版「鬼滅の刃」無限列車編
results.overview: Tanjirō Kamado, joined with Inosuke Hashibira, a boy raised by boars who wears a boar's head, and Zenitsu Agatsuma, a scared boy who reveals his true power when he sleeps, boards the Infinity Train on a new mission with the Fire Hashira, Kyōjurō Rengoku, to defeat a demon who has been tormenting the people and killing the demon slayers who oppose it!
results.title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Movie: Mugen Train

results.overview: The Templeton brothers — Tim and his Boss Baby little bro Ted — have become adults and drifted away from each other. But a new boss baby with a cutting-edge approach and a can-do attitude is about to bring them together again … and inspire a new family business.
results.title: The Boss Baby: Family Business

results.overview: Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos.
results.title: PAW Patrol: The Movie

results.overview: Poe Dameron and BB-8 must face the greedy crime boss Graballa the Hutt, who has purchased Darth Vader’s castle and is renovating it into the galaxy’s first all-inclusive Sith-inspired luxury hotel.
results.title: LEGO Star Wars Terrifying Tales

results.overview: Luca and his best friend Alberto experience an unforgettable summer on the Italian Riviera. But all the fun is threatened by a deeply-held secret: they are sea monsters from another world just below the water’s surface.
results.title: Luca

results.overview: When LeBron and his young son Dom are trapped in a digital space by a rogue A.I., LeBron must get them home safe by leading Bugs, Lola Bunny and the whole gang of notoriously undisciplined Looney Tunes to victory over the A.I.'s digitized champions on the court. It's Tunes versus Goons in the highest-stakes challenge of his life.
results.title: Space Jam: A New Legacy

results.original_title: My Little Pony: A New Generation
results.overview: Equestria's divided. But a bright-eyed hero believes Earth Ponies, Pegasi and Unicorns should be pals — and, hoof to heart, she’s determined to prove it.
results.title: My Little Pony: A New Generation

results.overview: An epic journey of a young hero and her Spirit Guides, 'Dillo' a cute and humorous armadillo and "Vaca" a goofy oversized tapir, who embark on a quest to save their home in the spectacular Amazon Rainforest.
results.title: Ainbo: Spirit of the Amazon

results.original_title: Straight Outta Nowhere: Scooby-Doo! Meets Courage the Cowardly Dog
results.overview: With Mystery, Inc. on the tail of a strange object in Nowhere, Kansas, the strange hometown of Eustice, Muriel, and Courage, the gang soon find themselves contending with a giant cicada monster and her winged warriors.
results.title: Straight Outta Nowhere: Scooby-Doo! Meets Courage the Cowardly Dog

results.original_title: 機動戦士ガンダム 閃光のハサウェイ
results.overview: After Char's rebellion, Hathaway Noa leads an insurgency against Earth Federation, but meeting an enemy officer and a mysterious woman alters his fate.
results.title: Mobile Suit Gundam Hathaway

results.original_title: Miraculous World: Shanghai, la légende de Ladydragon
results.overview: On school break, Marinette heads to Shanghai to meet Adrien. But after arriving, Marinette loses all her stuff, including the Miraculous that allows her to turn into Ladybug!
results.title: Miraculous World: Shanghai – The Legend of Ladydragon

results.overview: A rooster and his fowl partner embark on a dangerous trip to the Congo to recover their stolen eggs from a group of Russian goons.
results.title: Eggs Run

results.original_title: 劇場版ポケットモンスター ココ
results.overview: In the Forest of Okoya, Koko is a feral child who has been raised as a Pokémon by the Mythical Pokémon Zarude. Koko has grown up never doubting that he is a Pokémon even though he can't really use any sort of moves. Ash Ketchum and Pikachu meet Koko and help him protect the Great Tree from the crooked scientist Dr. Zed.
results.title: Pokémon the Movie: Secrets of the Jungle

results.original_title: Monster Pets: A Hotel Transylvania Short
results.overview: Drac tries out some new monster pets to help occupy Tinkles for playtime.
results.title: Monster Pets: A Hotel Transylvania Short

results.overview: Barbie swaps the sunny shores of Malibu for the bright lights of Broadway to attend an excusive summer performing arts program and meets…Barbie!  Fast friends, the two discover they share more than a name as they explore New York City and all the amazing things they have in common.  As they compete for the coveted once-in-a-lifetime Spotlight Solo from Times Square, the friends discover competition isn’t all about winning, it’s about striving to be your best, overcoming doubts, and sharing the spotlight.
results.title: Barbie: Big City, Big Dreams

results.overview: When Lois Lane is killed, an unhinged Superman decides to take control of the Earth. Determined to stop him, Batman creates a team of freedom-fighting heroes. But when superheroes go to war, can the world survive?
results.title: Injustice

results.overview: Long ago, in the fantasy world of Kumandra, humans and dragons lived together in harmony. But when an evil force threatened the land, the dragons sacrificed themselves to save humanity. Now, 500 years later, that same evil has returned and it’s up to a lone warrior, Raya, to track down the legendary last dragon to restore the fractured land and its divided people.
results.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
